royalRansom.name: Swordbearer
royalRansom.explanation: That was a perfect run! You earned a new title - Swordbearer!

royalRansom.name: Esquire
royalRansom.explanation: You completed the entire area without getting hit! You get a new title - Esquire!

royalRansom.name: Knight
royalRansom.explanation: A perfect mission? Now that's impressive! You get a new title - Knight!

royalRansom.name: Royal Guardian
royalRansom.explanation: Wow, you finished all three royal missions! The honor of a new title is yours - Royal Guardian

pirateBusiness.name: Powder Monkey
pirateBusiness.explanation: A scene without taking damage? Not bad! You earned the title - Powder Monkey!

pirateBusiness.name: Buccaneer
pirateBusiness.explanation: Blimey! You got through a location without getting hit! A new title is yours - Buccaneer!

pirateBusiness.name: First Mate
pirateBusiness.explanation: A perfect mission? Well shiver me timbers! You earned the title First Mate!

pirateBusiness.name: Pirate Captain
pirateBusiness.explanation: Blimey! You completed all three Pirate Business missions! A title fit for a sea lover is yours - Pirate Captain!

tikiQuartet.name: Traveller
tikiQuartet.explanation: Hey, that run was perfect! You deserve a new title for that - Traveler!

tikiQuartet.name: Gold Seeker
tikiQuartet.explanation: You passed the entire location without taking damage! You get a new title - Gold Seeker!

tikiQuartet.name: Famed Explorer
tikiQuartet.explanation: Nice, a perfect mission! You've earned a new title - Famed Explorer!

tikiQuartet.name: Temple Raider
tikiQuartet.explanation: Incredible! You completed all three Tiki Trouble missions! The tikis agree you deserve a new title - Temple Raider!

general.name: Dedicated Adventurer
general.explanation: You've visited Adventure Island __X__ days in a row now! You get a new title - Dedicated Adventurer!

general.name: Skilled Adventurer
general.explanation: Cool, you've played __X__ missions already! You get a new title - Skilled Adventurer!

general.name: Adventure Lover
general.explanation: Woah, you've played __X__ missions today! You get a new title - Adventure Lover!

general.name: Grand Adventurer
general.explanation: You've played __X__ minutes of Adventure Island! Now that's awesome! You deserve a new title - Grand Adventurer!
